sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Presents CLASSIC MOVIE MONDAY
Stars: Greta Garbo, Conrad Nagel, Lew Ayres
Director: Jacques Feyde
üçïORIGINAL SYNCRONIZED SCOREüçï
Can a movie revolve around a single, solitary kiss? It can‚Äîwhen the lips belong to the mesmerizing Greta Garbo! In her final silent film, the Silver Screen goddess is joined by Conrad Nagel and a young Lew Ayres in his breakout role. This captivating romantic drama explores themes of infidelity, rivalry, manslaughter, and the dangerous power of passion. 

Garbo delivers a haunting performance as a married woman trapped in a loveless marriage, caught between desire and duty. As tensions rise, a single kiss sets off a dramatic chain of events‚Äîincluding a shocking act of manslaughter and a gripping courtroom showdown. With early synchronized sound, moody cinematography, and a score full of tension, The Kiss is a must-watch for classic film lovers.
